support_default.subject: We received your message
support_default.body:
Hi there,

We've received your message and opened a ticket (#{{ticket_id}}). A team member will reply within 1 business day.

— Oubon Shop Support

refund_request.subject: Your refund request for order {{order_id}}
refund_request.body:
Hi {{name}},

We've received your refund request for order {{order_id}}.

Our team is reviewing your request and will process it within 24 hours. If eligible, your refund will be issued to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.

If you have any questions, just reply to this email.

— Oubon Shop Support

support_quality.subject: We're here to help with your order
support_quality.body:
Hi {{name}},

We're sorry to hear you're having an issue with your order. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Our support team is reviewing your case and will respond within 24 hours with a solution. We'll make this right!

— Oubon Shop Support

tracking_lookup.subject: Tracking info for your order
tracking_lookup.body:
Hi {{name}},

Looking into your order status now! Please reply with your order number (found in your confirmation email) so we can provide you with the most accurate tracking information.

We'll get back to you right away.

— Oubon Shop Support

order_help.subject: We're here to help with your order
order_help.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thanks for reaching out about your order!

Please reply with your order number so we can look into this for you and provide you with the most accurate information.

— Oubon Shop Support

vip_welcome.subject: Thanks for reaching out, {{name}}
vip_welcome.body:
Hi {{name}},

We'll jump on this right away.

— Oubon Shop Support

order_missing.subject: We're on it – order {{order_id}}
order_missing.body:
Hi there,

Sorry your package hasn't arrived. Please reply with your order number and we'll investigate right away.

— Oubon Shop Support

billing_help.subject: We're looking into your billing inquiry
billing_help.body:
Hi {{name}},

We've received your billing inquiry and take payment concerns very seriously.

Our billing team is reviewing your account and will respond within 24 hours with a detailed explanation. If there's been an error, we'll fix it immediately.

— Oubon Shop Billing

quiet_hours_auto.subject: We received your message
quiet_hours_auto.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thanks for contacting Oubon Shop! We've received your message and will send you a detailed response during our next business hours:

  • Monday-Friday: 7 AM - 9 PM EST
  • Saturday-Sunday: 10 AM - 7 PM EST

You'll receive a personalized reply addressing your specific question or concern shortly.

— Oubon Shop Support
